detail_desc: Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved blouse in satin with a small stand-up collar and concealed buttons down the front. Wide cuffs with a slit and button, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Underwired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Dress in soft cotton jersey with butterfly sleeves, gathers at the top, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Shorts in stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets and a lace trim at the hems.
Boat-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in a soft, ribbed cotton blend with short sleeves.
Long-sleeved body in lace with a V-neck, mesh side sections and press-studs at the crotch. Lined bust.

Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with contrasting colour details. Stand-up collar, zip with a chin guard at the top and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back with reflective details.
Fully lined, patterned bikini. Top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a frill trim at the top and hem. Bottoms with a frill trim at the waist.
Trousers in airy linen. Relaxed fit with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets, a fake back pocket, and gently tapered legs.
Strapless playsuit in a viscose weave with elastication and a frilled edge at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and short legs.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband.
Small, glow-in-the-dark plastic toy dinosaurs in various sizes and designs. Size approx. 3x5 cm.
Sandals with open sides and toes and crossover straps at the front. Imitation leather insoles.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Long-sleeved nursing top in soft viscose jersey with an elasticated seam and decorative ties at the waist and a wrapover front with a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in sturdy, washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.
Metal chain necklaces in various designs and lengths, two with bead-shaped pendants.

LIMITED EDITION. Kaftan dress in patterned satin with a frill-trimmed V-neck and wide, 3/4-length sleeves with a flounced trim. Gathered, concealed elastication at the waist to create soft draping. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Playsuit in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Set with a vest top and pair of shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist.
Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a square neckline front and back and an integral sports bra with a double-layered front and elasticated hem.
Jacket in supersoft faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and patch front pockets. Lined.
Fine-knit gloves.
Short dress in a softly draping weave with a collar, V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and a tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Lined, non-wired, one-shoulder bikini top. Cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
High profile Chelsea boots in soft leather with elastic gores down both sides of the shaft. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 4 cm.
Briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fitted jumper in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a polo neck, long sleeves and short slits in the sides.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waist panel.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a rounded, frill-trimmed collar in woven fabric, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the sweatshirt is recycled.
Short, wide shorts in a viscose weave with a high, elasticated, frill-trimmed waist and side pockets.
Calf-length skirt in an airy viscose weave with a high waist and buttons down the front. Unlined.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with gathered seams at the front and smocking at the sides. Cups with removable inserts that shape the bust, double, adjustable shoulder straps and concealed elastication at the hem. Light support. The polyester content of the bra is recycled.
High-waisted trousers in woven fabric with large patch front pockets, a zip fly with two buttons and straight, slightly shorter legs.
Sleeveless jersey top in a linen blend with a round neck and pleated lace frill at the shoulders. Gathers in the side seams for best fit over the tummy.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Sports bag in woven fabric with two handles, a detachable adjustable shoulder strap and a zip at the top. One zipped outer compartment and one zipped inner compartment. Padded base. Lined. Size 21x24x48 cm.
Hard smartphone case in plastic with a print motif. Fits iPhone 6/6s/7/8.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a boat neck and dropped shoulders.
Double-breasted coat in an Italian wool blend with notch lapels, buttons at the front, welt side pockets, one inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with padded cups, wide lightly padded shoulder straps that cross at the back and an elastic hem with hook-and-eye fasteners. Extra firm support.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front, short, wide sleeves and a tie detail at the hem. Unlined.
Maxi dress in soft silk with a V-neck front and back and long, wide, tie-top shoulder straps. Straight style with a low-cut, gathered, voluminous skirt.
Short 5-pocket skirt in washed stretch denim with a zip fly and button, short slits in the sides and a raw-edge, frayed hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, high-waisted skirt in suede with decorative seams. Visible zip and a concealed button at the back. Lined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a ribbed polo neck, short raglan sleeves with ribbed trims, and a ribbed hem.
Sports socks in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a ribbed shaft and ribbed section over the foot for optimum fit and comfort. Reinforced toes and heels.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, wide ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
Sweatpants with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool. High, ribbed collar, low dropped shoulders with decorative sparkly buttons on one side, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication at the waist and side pockets.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Chinos in an airy cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads with a button at the top.

Short, A-line dress in a crinkled viscose weave with a round neckline, small opening with ties at the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seams at the hem and on the sleeves for added width and soft draping. Unlined.

Long lace dress with a small, scalloped stand-up collar, an open section and concealed zip at the back and scalloped, butterfly sleeves. Seam at the waist with a gently flared asymmetric skirt which is longer at the back. Satin lining.
Wrist warmers in soft, rib-knit cashmere with thumbholes.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Biker jacket in imitation suede with a collar, decorative buttons on the lapels and a diagonal zip at the front. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, zipped chest pocket and side pocket, small flap pocket with a press-stud at the front and a tab and press-stud at the sides. Lined.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a jersey-lined hood with an elasticated drawstring. Zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front, zipped, diagonal front pockets and an inner pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Nursing bras in soft stretch fabric with opening, lined cups with removable inserts and space for nursing pads. Wide elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Seamless.

Padded outdoor trousers in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with sealed seams and adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Zip fly and press-stud, reinforced at the hems and back, elasticated hems, a reinforced elastic strap under the feet and a reflective strip on one leg. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Sleeveless blouse in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck with ties at the top. Buttons down the front, smocking and gathers at the shoulders and an elasticated seam at the back of the waist.
Soft jeans in washed, stretch denim with elasticated ribbing and a press-stud at the waist and a fake fly. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with straight hems.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum comfort.

Shirt in an airy viscose weave with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Wide-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying mesh. Racer back with a cut-out section and narrow elastication at the hem. The polyester content of the vest top is partly recycled.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede and imitation patent leather with pointed toes and open sides. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Oversized T-shirt in shimmering mesh containing glittery threads. Dropped shoulders and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Short 5-pocket patterned denim skirt with a zip fly and button and raw-edge hem.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with lapped shoulders, picot trims and press-studs at the crotch.
Jumper in rib-knit cotton with a high collar, zip at the top and long raglan sleeves.
Suede desert boots with a lightly padded top edge and lacing at the front. Leather linings and insoles and chunky natural rubber soles. Heel approx. 3 cm.
Leggings in cotton jersey with a glittery pattern and a glittery elasticated waistband.
